name: Mom
wishText: On this beautiful day, I wish you a birthday filled with endless laughter, unforgettable memories, and all the love in the world. But more than that, I want to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for having you in my life. You've been an incredible mother, always there with me through thick and thin. From the late-night talks to being my rock in hard times, your support has meant everything to me. Happy birthday, Mom! May this day be as special as you are. Have a fantastic day!
text1: Guess what? It's your day to shine!
textInChatBox: Hey, Siri! Could you please help me send a heartwarming birthday message to my Mom, Sunitha?
text2: I've been counting down the days for this momentous occasion.
text3: And guess what? I've orchestrated a surprise that will leave you speechless!
bigTextPart2: Can you believe it's finally here?
outroText: Here's to celebrating another year of your incredible existence!
replayText: Thank you for being the amazing person you are, Mom. You bring so much light and love into my life. Wishing you endless joy, laughter, and blessings today and always.
